BackstoryDef.title: powerhouse
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]’s purpose was written before [PAWN_pronoun] was even born: to become a guardian. To serve, live and die for the nobility. The nobles that guardians served usually belonged to physically weak but mentally superb races, such as genies or various types of space elf, so it was paramount that [PAWN_nameDef] was bred to have enough strength for two.

BackstoryDef.title: prospective guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a baby of royal blood is born, so is an assemblage of prospective guardians. These newborns are bred to possess the crème de la crème of minotaur genetics, fit, literally, for a king. Of these calves, only the strongest is bestowed the title of guardian. Their life, eternally pledged to the young royal. And their purpose, to forever protect and fight for their master, be it in confidence or even sacrifice. [PAWN_nameDef] was such a calf.

BackstoryDef.title: rejected guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was reared to become a guardian of a rather troublesome, young aristocrat. Upon meeting [PAWN_possessive] master for the first time, [PAWN_pronoun] was scorned and rejected, with [PAWN_possessive] master in disbelief that such an abhorrent creature could exist outside of fairy-tales. [PAWN_nameDef] never recovered from such rejection.

BackstoryDef.title: friendly guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to protect a young monarch, yet their relationship was more akin to siblinghood than anything else. As the two of them aged, learned, and played together, their bond became totally unbreakable.

BackstoryDef.title: lab-grown guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was biologically engineered to be the perfect guardian, eventually taking [PAWN_possessive] first breath of life in a cold, austere laboratory. [PAWN_nameDef] was then taught the essensials: how to fight, serve and obey.

BackstoryDef.title: guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a guardian to a nobleperson. Though the relationship was initially rocky, the two gained an unbreakable, unconditional bond capable of weathering even the fiercest of storms. [PAWN_nameDef] isn’t afraid to look death in the eye for [PAWN_possessive] master.

BackstoryDef.title: guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] matured into a disciplined and stoic guardian to [PAWN_possessive] master, uttering not even a sound unless it was by their request. Though [PAWN_possessive] spoke very little, [PAWN_possessive] was capable of penning the most saccharine and passionate poetry known to man. Well, that is, if man was ever able to see it.

BackstoryDef.title: guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a loving and compassionate guardian to [PAWN_possessive] master, readily repurposing [PAWN_possessive] body as a comforting pillow to them when days had been tough.

BackstoryDef.title: guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]’s unrequited feelings of love for [PAWN_possessive] master have forever brought [PAWN_objective] shame and anguish. Watching them fall in love with potential suitors over and over again has only worsened the wound that [PAWN_nameDef] has to hide.

BackstoryDef.title: guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Out of all of the guardians out there, [PAWN_nameDef] is certainly one of them. Though [PAWN_pronoun] really tries [PAWN_possessive] best, nothing can ever seem to go right for [PAWN_objective] and [PAWN_possessive] master.

BackstoryDef.title: guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became a guardian to a nobleperson, vowing to fight to the death to ensure [PAWN_possessive] master’s safety.

BackstoryDef.title: guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] serves their master diligently. Whether it’s slaying a foe on the battlefield or pouring the finest cup of tea on this side of the rim, [PAWN_nameDef] executes such duties with finesse and class.

BackstoryDef.title: guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] developed illicit relations with [PAWN_possessive] master, punishable by death should the royal family find out. The two strategized the location and time of their steamy rendezvous in order to evade the public eye, until eventually, the two ended their relationship. [PAWN_nameDef] continues to guard [PAWN_possessive] master with a strained heart.

BackstoryDef.title: guardian
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] not only cared for [PAWN_possessive] master, but cared for each and every one of the darling animals residing in the royal stables.

BackstoryDef.title: show calf
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the perfect show calf. Many show calves resented their human owners, but [PAWN_nameDef] rather enjoyed all of the attention.

BackstoryDef.title: runaway
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was taken from [PAWN_possessive] family at birth: a standard procedure on a minotaur farm. These farms were typically established and maintained by humans, who would slaughter their minotaur for their desirable cuts of meat. [PAWN_nameDef] didn’t take too kindly to the thought of being someone’s supper, and so, escaped captivity in the dead of night.

BackstoryDef.title: isolated
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] whittled away much of [PAWN_possesive] childhood nestled between the breasts of a mountainous tundra. The hamlet that surrounded [PAWN_objective] was quaint, but violently anti-human, with [PAWN_nameDef]’s father even warning [PAWN_objective] to check under their bed every night for humans.

BackstoryDef.title: maze dweller
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in a vast labyrinth, destined to guard the treasures that lay within there. But those shining, unknown treasures were just too tempting for [PAWN_nameDef]’s mother, who ultimately ventured into the golden vault and never returned.

BackstoryDef.title: wild beast
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was found and reared by a tribe like a wild animal.

BackstoryDef.title: city dweller
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in a diverse society of xenos. Unlike many members of [PAWN_possessive] race, [PAWN_nameDef] was always happy to play and interact with humans as equals.

BackstoryDef.title: human fighter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] fought in the timeless minotaur tradition of humanfighting. Plucky gladiators would stride into the colosseum, only to soon cower under [PAWN_nameDef]’s might, with the climax of the performance being the ‘estocada’, in which [PAWN_pronoun] would pierce the heart or spine of the human with an elegant steel blade. All of this bloodshed didn’t trouble [PAWN_nameDef]. No, [PAWN_pronoun] lived for it.

BackstoryDef.title: logger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] felled trees for a living, sawing their trunks with ease and exporting the spoils to nearby human settlements.

BackstoryDef.title: cut of meat
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was sold to an intergalactic butcher for [PAWN_possessive] delectable meat. Upon entering the trade ship, [PAWN_nameDef] broke free from [PAWN_possessive] shackles and made mincemeat of each and every one of the crew, leaving not one survivor to tell the tale, but [PAWN_objective].

BackstoryDef.title: xenohustler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] made a living working in a ‘Xenobrothel’. The backbone of the business was, unsurprisingly, human tourists, who would slobber at the chance to experience lovin’ with exotic xenos. It wasn’t unusual for [PAWN_nameDef]’s clients to require medical attention after their tumble under the sheets.

BackstoryDef.title: treasurekeeper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] guarded a mystifying labyrinth from those attempting to plunder the treasures inside.

BackstoryDef.title: royal youth
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was practically born into a life of luxury and opulence, residing between the walls of a fanciful palace that wouldn’t look amiss in Elysium. [PAWN_nameDef] grew up alongside a minotaur guardian, who protected and nurtured [PAWN_possessive] every need.

BackstoryDef.title: protected monarch
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a member of the nobility, wherever [PAWN_nameDef] stepped, so did their minotaur guardian, standing only a bull’s breath behind them. Their destinies are forever intertwined and bound by blood.

BackstoryDef.title: protected monarch
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Resting [PAWN_possessive] head in the lap of luxury eventually took it’s toll on [PAWN_nameDef], who decided to embark [PAWN_objective] on the journey of living like the common folk. Now, that’s all well and good, but for someone who had never seen a frying pan before…independence was more than a lifetime away for [PAWN_objective]…

BackstoryDef.title: protected monarch
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] minotaur guardian roamed the rim together in search of ancient treasures and artefacts, much to the objection [PAWN_nameDef]’s family, who looked down their noses at [PAWN_possessive] escapades.
